content.question: Which of the following is an accurate description of the relationship between wheat prices and malt barley prices shown on the graph?

choices.label: Wheat prices generally rose as malt barley prices fell.
Wheat prices and malt barley prices generally rose and fell together.
Wheat prices generally fell before malt barley prices did.
Increases and decreases in wheat and malt barley prices generally had little relationship with each other.

content.answer: Wheat prices and malt barley prices generally rose and fell together.

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
